::Feline::

She smiled at him and looked into his eyes. "I like the color change. 
It suits you."  SHe walked up to him and kissed him. "Of course we 
have something. Or actually, we have a whole lot of somethings." She 
chuckled. "And a whole lot more somethings to look forward to in the 
future."  She flicked the tip of her tail against his nose and smiled.

She really knew that her loving him was the only real way to keep him 
under control untill she got him to see Zardus. So she wold be in 
love with him for now.   But she felt something strange inside of her 
spark.  Could she really be falling for him.  She did find him a 
little more attractive now that he was more like her. She couldn't 
help but wonder if she was starting to truely fall for him. She was 
bigging to think that maybe she was.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He came out of the CR. He was now mostly black with red, and very 
little
> yellow. The mostly red, orange and yellow paturn was gone. He walked
> right up to. Feline. He had been thinking about if she really loved 
him,
> or was it all part of the plan. He just came out with it.
> "So tell me, did we really have something, or was it just another
> pleasure of your asignment? Oh, and what do you think, of my new 
paint
> job?"
